features.title: Essential Features
features.subtitle: Built with a focus on speed, privacy, and quality.

fast_processing.title: Fast Processing
fast_processing.description: Instant conversion in your browser, no server uploads

privacy.title: Total Privacy
privacy.description: Your images never leave your device, ensuring complete privacy

download.title: Instant Download
download.description: Download your ready-to-use ICO file in seconds

about.title: About IcoSmith
about.description: IcoSmith is an open-source tool, created with passion for developers and designers looking for a fast and reliable way to convert images to the .ico format.

free.title: 100% Free
free.description: No limits, no sign-up, no hidden catches.

privacy.title: Private by Design
privacy.description: Local processing. Your data never leaves your device.

hero.title: IcoSmith
hero.description: Convert PNG or JPG to .ICO in your browser — no uploads, all common sizes, ready in seconds.

processing.success_subtitle: Your icons are ready for download

validation.unexpected: Unexpected error during validation. Please try again.
validation.corrupted: Corrupted or invalid file format. Please try another image.
validation.network: Network error. Please check your connection and try again.
validation.unknown: Unexpected error. Please try again or use another file.
validation.rate_limit: Too many uploads in a short time. Please wait a moment.
validation.processing_timeout: Processing took too long. Please try with a smaller image.

suggestions.file_type: Try converting your image to PNG or JPG.
suggestions.file_size: Resize or compress the image to reduce its size.
suggestions.dimensions_too_small: Use an image with a higher resolution.
suggestions.dimensions_too_large: Resize the image to be smaller than 4096x4096px.
suggestions.corrupted: The file seems to be damaged. Try exporting it again.
suggestions.generic: Try reloading the page or using a different file.

processing.generic_suggestion: It seems something went wrong. Please try again.

preview.title: Conversion Complete!
preview.subtitle: Your favicon is ready to use

grid.subtitle: Click any icon to see usage details
